overview: A young girl roams through the wild nature with binoculars, walkie-talkie and a big pinch of joy of discovery. She is fascinated by found objects such as old sneakers and sees the special in all the things around her. She collects her strange booty on a big old tree - on which one day an older man is leaning asleep, who actually wanted to find something completely different than Tilda in this place.
title: Tildas Trost
